DOC.brief_title: Effects Food Pharmacokinetics Tesetaxel 10 mg Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct determine whether pharmacokinetics single dose tesetaxel administer capsule affect co-administration food ( high-fat meal ) .
DOC.criteria: Key inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female subject 18 75 year age . 2 . Histologically cytologically confirm advanced solid tumor malignancy . 3 . Negative serum pregnancy test within 7 day prior first dose study drug woman childbearing potential . 4 . Agreement use highly effective form contraception throughout treatment phase study woman childbearing potential sexually active men . 5 . Body weight â‰¥ 50 kg woman men BMI within range 19 35 kg/m2 inclusive . 6 . 12lead ECG without clinically significant abnormality judge Investigator . 7 . Able swallow oral medication . 8 . Adequate organ system function . Key exclusion criterion : 1 . A positive prestudy hepatitis B surface antigen . 2 . Symptomatic acute hepatic biliary abnormality . 3 . Clinically significant gastrointestinal abnormality increase risk perforation . 4 . Presence uncontrolled infection . 5 . Positive prestudy drug/alcohol screen . 6 . Treatment investigational agent within follow time period prior first dose study drug : 30 day , 5 halflives , twice duration biological effect investigational product ( whichever long ) . 7 . Current treatment cancer therapy cause significant gastrointestinal side effect , include limited , nausea , vomit , diarrhea . 8 . Any serious and/or unstable preexist medical , psychiatric , condition could interfere subject 's safety , obtain informed consent , compliance study . 9 . Pregnancy lactation . 10 . Hypoalbuminemia ( serum albumin < 3.0 g/dL ) screening . 11 . Consumption red wine , seville orange , grapefruit grapefruit juice , and/or pummelo , exotic citrus fruit , grapefruit hybrid within 14 day prior first dose study drug .
